title: Salvator Mundi
description: A Renaissance portrait of Christ as Savior of the World, rediscovered in the 21st century.

title: Interchange
description: An abstract expressionist painting known for its dynamic brushwork and vibrant palette.

title: The Card Players
description: Depicts two men playing cards in a rustic setting, part of a famous series.

title: Nafea Faa Ipoipo (When Will You Marry?)
description: A vibrant portrayal of Tahitian women representing beauty and cultural identity.

title: Mona Lisa
description: One of the most famous portraits in the world, celebrated for its enigmatic smile.

title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
description: A delicate and intimate portrayal of a young girl in exotic dress with a pearl earring.

title: The Night Watch
description: A large group portrait of a city militia, known for its dramatic use of light.

title: Lady with an Ermine
description: A portrait symbolizing purity and intellect, featuring Cecilia Gallerani.

title: Portrait of Dora Maar
description: A Cubist portrait of Picasso’s lover, expressing complex emotion and geometry.

title: Whistler's Mother
description: An iconic image of motherhood and discipline, also known as 'Arrangement in Grey and Black No.1'.

title: The Birth of Venus
description: Depicts the goddess Venus emerging from the sea, a masterpiece of mythological beauty.

title: American Gothic
description: A classic image of rural Americana symbolizing resilience and tradition.

title: The Starry Night
description: A dreamy, swirling night sky viewed from Van Gogh’s asylum room.

title: The Scream
description: An expressionist depiction of existential angst and fear.
madeOf: Oil, tempera, and pastel on cardboard

title: The Persistence of Memory
description: Surrealist painting featuring melting clocks that explores time and dreams.

title: The Last Supper
description: Depicts Jesus and his disciples at the moment of betrayal.

title: The Creation of Adam
description: Famous for the nearly touching hands of God and Adam, symbolizing life.

title: The Kiss
description: A golden, ornamental painting of intimate love and connection.
madeOf: Oil and gold leaf on canvas

title: Napoleon Crossing the Alps
description: Heroic portrayal of Napoleon’s military leadership and resolve.

title: The Arnolfini Portrait
description: Intricate and symbolic portrait of a wealthy couple.

title: The Night Café
description: Uses bold colors to depict emotional intensity in a café scene.

title: Icarus Faces Fate
description: A modern interpretation of the myth of Icarus and ambition.

title: Saturn Devouring His Son
description: A haunting depiction of time and power consuming youth.
madeOf: Oil on plaster, transferred to canvas

title: Stańczyk
description: A melancholic jester amidst a royal celebration, symbolizing hidden sorrow.
